description: Eventbrite enables organizers to plan, promote, and manage events, selling tickets and providing attendee tools for conferences, concerts, and gatherings

tools.name: EVENTBRITE_GET_EVENT_CATEGORIES
tools.description: Tool to retrieve event categories. Use when selecting a category for an event. Localizes results via optional locale parameter.

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: Return categories in this locale (BCP-47 format), e.g., 'en_US'.

tools.name: EVENTBRITE_GET_EVENT_FORMATS
tools.description: Tool to list event formats. Use when you need the available formats before creating or updating an event.

inputSchema.title: GetEventFormatsRequest
inputSchema.description: Request model for GET_EVENT_FORMATS action (no parameters).

tools.name: EVENTBRITE_GET_EVENT_SUBCATEGORIES
tools.description: Tool to list all event subcategories. Use when fetching available subcategory options, optionally filtered by locale after selecting a category.

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: Return subcategories in this locale (BCP-47 format), e.g., 'en_US'.
